# title

**Type Property**

A key for the title.

## Declaration

```swift
static let title: UIActivityItemsConfigurationMetadataKey
```

## Discussion

The value of this key is an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSString] or [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSAttributedString] that contains the title.

## Constants

- **messageBody**: A key for the message body.
- **linkPresentationMetadata**
- **shareRecipients**
- **collaborationModeRestrictions**

items.description: A key for the message body.
items.name: messageBody

title: title
